sink.preCopyScript:
DELETE FROM HWAI_Benefits
WHERE BenefitType='b14c' and Year=YEAR(GETDATE( ));

body.value:

 "title":"PIPELINE RUN FOR Benefit_file_b14c_to_DB IS SUCCESS",

}
